text: Cecil Fairfax Goodricke (1883–1944) was a sailor from South Africa, who represented his country at the 1932 Summer Olympics in the Snowbird as well as in the Star in Los Angeles, US. ==Sources== * Category:1883 births Category:1944 deaths Category:Sportspeople from Durban Category:Colony of Natal people Category:South African male sailors (sport) Category:Sailors at the 1932 Summer Olympics – Snowbird Category:Sailors at the 1932 Summer Olympics – Star Category:Olympic sailors of South Africa
title: Cecil Goodricke
